experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Assisted the senior accountant in the performance of all financial activities to include financial statements and management reports. Gathered and analyzed information from inter-departmental systems to the G/L to test for inconsistencies/errors and reasonableness. Researched accounting transactions to identify and resolve discrepancies. Reconciled bank and various G/L accounts; created invoices and collected on overdue accounts. Identified various errors and inconsistencies between reports used to book figures in the G/L; worked with IT to resolve the discrepancy and new reports were created. Improved reconciling variances by monitoring cash control of all office locations and collaborating with office practice managers to increase efficiency and accuracy.

experience.title: Medicare Compliance Coder

Retrieved patient records to assess insurance coverage and acquired CPT and ICD-9 codes to ensure proper treatment and billing of procedures. Reviewed and processed visits from system-generated work lists, reports, and remittances to insurance companies. Ensured records were complete and compliant with regulations; demonstrated knowledge of HIPAA Privacy and Security Regulations.

experience.title: Hospital Access Representative

experience.title: Patient Financial Representative
experience.description: Recorded and filed patient data and medical records. Reviewed medical records for accuracy and completeness as required by insurance companies. Obtained insurance authorizations for procedures and tests. Entered procedure codes, diagnosis codes, and patient information into billing software. Ensured proper coding and sequencing of diagnoses and procedures. Identified errors and re-filed denied/rejected claims. Reviewed remittance codes, completed appeals, and submitted claims. Investigated past due invoices and minimized unpaid accounts.
